      • getTransientsPath

        @Nonnull
public abstract String getTransientsPath()
        The path where transient renditions of this will be stored. This path is below "/var/composum/assets" and replicates the path of the asset with insertions of the version of the jcr:content node whereever there is one, to make sure an asset gets a new place whenever it would be rendered differently. For example, a rendition /content/foo/bar/somesite/assets/bloom.jpg/square/original/bloom/square/medium.jpg could get a getTransientsPath() /var/composum/assets/content/foo/bar/somesite/{sitecfgversion}/assets/{assetscfgversion}/bloom.jpg/{ bloomcfgversion}/square/{squareoriginalversion}/medium with the UUIDs of the version of the jcr:content node in somesite, assets and bloom.jpg, and the version of the original of the square variation inserted at the appropriate place. If this isn't a staged version, we try to use the last modification time with prefix "workspace" instead.

      • getResource

        public com.composum.sling.core.ResourceHandle getResource()

      • versionMarker

        @Nullable
protected String versionMarker​(@Nullable
                               org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        Tries to find the version UUID in the JCR version storage to which the jcr:content node if this node refers to; failing that, we use AssetsConstants.NODE_WORKSPACECONFIGURED + "-" + last modification time in seconds. If the node has no jcr:content, we return null.
